title: Captain James Cook
creator_credit: Geoffrey Collings, Bern Gandy and Shell Film Unit
brief_description: Retraces the voyages of Captain Cook along the east coast of Australia from Mallacoota Inlet to Cape York, and contrasts Cook’s comments with the developments that have since taken place. Gabo island, Botany Bay, Brisgane, Bustard Bay and Rockhampton, Magnetic Island, Cape Tribulation, the Endeavour River and the present Cooktown. Suitable for secondary school level.
